item.title: Report X-2023081805
item.description:
Report X-2023081805

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-22T15:12:14+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-22
  • City: ROANOKE
  • State: VA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: We have received a tip from a driver that a hazmat package is leaking and there BC which is for H@S logistics told the driver to drop off the package at the VSA table without any notice to the station. The driver said that there is a leak in her van where some of the solution leaked out. It was in the bottom corner of the p1000 van which is on Van # 448260 on WA0127. We went ahead and cleaned the spill using Amphomag universal spill neutralizer and Vinyl gloves. The bottle of concentrated detergent does have liquid in the bag, and it seems to be spilling at a seem just below the cap or on it. Contents only contained 1 single bottle of detergent. DescribePack: Seems to be a break in the seem just below or on the cap. DurationRel: 2 and MitigateEffect: Nothing was done until package arrived at station/spill not known. Open knowledge, package was placed in a container and spill was neutralized at spill location.

item.title: Report E-2023090409
item.description:
Report E-2023090409

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-19T15:12:14+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-18
  • City: PORTSMOUTH
  • State: VA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS FREIGHT, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: During off loading it was discovered that the load had shifted during transit and that one of the poly 5 gallon pails of floor stripper (un1824) had been crushed cy the other freight and had released 0.5 gallons of product. The warehouse crew was able to contain and cleanup the release, so no contractors were dispatched.

item.title: Report X-2023080609
item.description:
Report X-2023080609

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-19T15:12:14+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-02
  • City: WINCHESTER
  • State: VA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: During unload, package was on vanline belt and was discovered by manager to be leaking at bottom. Manager notified hazmat-trained employee, who isolated package for inspection. DescribePack: About 1/2 inch crack along seam near top of bottle. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Hazmat-trained employee immediately took package to isolated hazmat-designated area and enclosed package in hazmat bag.
